com.esri.mo2.ui.ren
Class Util

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.ui.ren.Util
public class Util
extends Object

Provides common utility functions for the Renderer's UI package.

addNoneOption

public static String[] addNoneOption(String[] options)
Adds the string to the 0'th location of array of strings. This is frequently used by the comboBoxes, to give the user the option of not choosing any, for example when the field names of a feature class is displayed.

Parameters:
options - the input array of strings
Returns:
an array of strings

clearScaleRenderer

public FeatureLayer clearScaleRenderer(FeatureLayer fl,
                                       Renderer rend)
Clears a scale renderer for the given layer. This is done only when the input renderer is a ScaleDependentRenderer

Parameters:
fl - the feature layer its renderer will be set to the given scale renderer
rend - the scale render
